UTM FABU Bridges Academia and Industry at Successful Engagement Session 2024
============================================================================

by [fadzly](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/author/fadzly/ "Posts by fadzly")
 | Jul 18, 2024 | [News](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/category/news/)

![](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/IMG_20240629_144553-2048x1536-1-980x735.jpg)

The Department of Quantity Surveying, [Faculty of Built Environment and Surveying (FABU)](https://builtsurvey.utm.my/)
, successfully hosted the _**Academic Industry Engagement Session 2024**_, an event aimed at fostering collaboration, enhancing research, and promoting innovation within the faculty and industry. The agenda highlighted the potential of industry experts sharing their knowledge to explore contemporary issues within the construction industry.

Details on : [https://news.utm.my/ms/2024/07/fabu-hosts-academic-industry-engagement-session/](https://news.utm.my/ms/2024/07/fabu-hosts-academic-industry-engagement-session/)
